LoginPage.title: COCOCO Scan
LoginPage.subtitle: AI-Powered Catalog Analysis. Optimized. Intelligent.
LoginPage.cardDescription: Enter your email to log in.
LoginPage.successDescription: Welcome back! You will be redirected shortly.
LoginPage.errorToastDescription: Please check your credentials and try again.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

AnalyzeCatalogPage.title: Analyze Catalog
AnalyzeCatalogPage.description: Select a category, upload one or more catalog files, and let our AI do the rest.
AnalyzeCatalogPage.newAnalysisDescription: Complete the details below to start a new catalog analysis.
AnalyzeCatalogPage.tip: The AI will analyze the file based on the prompt and instructions defined in the selected category.
AnalyzeCatalogPage.fileMissingError: At least one file is required.
AnalyzeCatalogPage.analysisSuccessToastDescription: Your catalog has been successfully analyzed.
AnalyzeCatalogPage.analysisFailedToastDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

CategoriesPage.title: Categories
CategoriesPage.editDialogDescription: Modify the details of your category.
CategoriesPage.addDialogDescription: Create a new category to classify and analyze your catalogs.
CategoriesPage.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what this category is for.
CategoriesPage.sampleFilesDescription: Upload one or more sample files to help the AI suggest a more accurate prompt.
CategoriesPage.promptPlaceholder: Tell the AI what to extract, e.g., 'Extract product names and prices.'
CategoriesPage.instructionsPlaceholder: Provide specific instructions, e.g., 'Format the output as JSON.'
CategoriesPage.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the category
CategoriesPage.bulkDeleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {count} selected categories.
CategoriesPage.toastSuggestErrorDescription: Please enter a category name first.
CategoriesPage.toastPromptSuggestedDescription: The AI has generated a prompt for you.
CategoriesPage.toastSuggestFailedDescription: Could not generate a prompt. Please try again.

validation.nameLength: Category name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.descriptionLength: Description must be at least 10 characters.
validation.promptLength: Prompt must be at least 10 characters.
validation.instructionsLength: Instructions must be at least 10 characters.

ResultsPage.title: Scanned Results
ResultsPage.description: Review and manage the analysis of your scanned catalogs.
ResultsPage.noResultsDescription: Perform an analysis from the dashboard to see the results here.
ResultsPage.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the analysis result for
ResultsPage.bulkDeleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {count} selected results.
ResultsPage.toastExportSuccessDescription: The result for "{name}" has been exported.
ResultsPage.toastResultDeletedDescription: The result for "{name}" has been deleted.

UsersPage.title: Users
UsersPage.description: Manage the users of your organization.
UsersPage.addDialogDescription: Complete the form to add a new user.
UsersPage.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user
UsersPage.bulkDeleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {count} selected users.
UsersPage.toastUserUpdatedDescription: The data for "{name}" has been updated.
UsersPage.toastInvitationSentDescription: An email invitation has been sent to {email}.
UsersPage.toastUserStatusUpdatedDescription: The status of {count} users has been updated.
UsersPage.toastUserStatusUpdated: The status of "{name}" has been updated.

validation.nameLength: Name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

ProfilePage.title: User Profile
ProfilePage.cardDescription: Edit your name, email, and profile picture.
ProfilePage.toastProfileUpdatedDescription: Your information has been successfully updated.
ProfilePage.toastAvatarUpdatedDescription: Your new photo has been saved.

validation.nameLength: Name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

FileUploader.fileTooLargeError: File is too large. Maximum size is {maxSize}MB.

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot Your Password?
ForgotPasswordPage.description: Don't worry. Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset it.
ForgotPasswordPage.successCardDescription: If an account exists with the email you provided, we have sent a link to reset your password.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

ResetPasswordPage.title: Reset Password
ResetPasswordPage.successCardDescription: Your password has been successfully reset. You will be redirected to the login page.
ResetPasswordPage.confirmDialogDescription: This action will update your password. Do you wish to continue?
ResetPasswordPage.toastSuccessDescription: Your password has been successfully updated.

validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.

SetPasswordPage.title: Welcome to COCOCO Scan!
SetPasswordPage.description: Set your user password to complete your account setup.
SetPasswordPage.successCardDescription: Your password has been set. You will now be redirected to log in.
SetPasswordPage.confirmDialogDescription: This action will set the password for your account. Do you wish to continue?
SetPasswordPage.toastSuccessDescription: Your account has been successfully configured.

validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
